Actions.Name: Bind
Actions.Description: The Wraith chooses two characters in range 6 of the wraith, then teleports them adjacent to each other.

Actions.Name: Split Ionize
Actions.Description: A character in range 8 must save or become marked. Electrified characters fail this save. While marked, they are vulnerable and have aura 2. Any time they take damage, all allies in the aura take 1 piercing damage.
